attributes.action: Debate to bring the death penalty back
attributes.additional_details: This will stop tax payers money being wasted on these murderers and terrorist and rapist being put in jail for years and become a deterrent.
attributes.background: We need to bring back the death penalty

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357
